readingMnemonic:
The reading is all on'yomi, and you know how to read 清. You didn't learn 涼's on'yomi (りょう) with the kanji though, so here's a mnemonic to help:

You want a <vocabulary>refreshing</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>cool</vocabulary> drink really badly. Why? You just had to <reading>row</reading> (りょう) across a huge lake. With the wind in your face. Imagine how refreshing a cool soda would be after rowing all day!
